text: One of the great advantages of mod harbour over PHP is that you can comment the HTML and Javascript code and then compile a desktop version of your program. This way debugging is much easier.

elements.text: One of the great advantages of mod harbour over PHP is that you can comment the HTML and Javascript code and then compile a desktop version of your program. This way debugging is much easier.

text:
> One of the great advantages of mod harbour over PHP is that you can comment the HTML and Javascript code and then compile a desktop version of your program. This way debugging is much easier.
You _can_ use PHP to build desktop applications, so that's not something specific to mod_harbour.

elements.text: One of the great advantages of mod harbour over PHP is that you can comment the HTML and Javascript code and then compile a desktop version of your program. This way debugging is much easier.
You
can
use PHP to build desktop applications, so that's not something specific to mod_harbour.

text: It's just that PHP was created for the web app niche, and it's not as used or well-supported elsewhere.

elements.text: It's just that PHP was created for the web app niche, and it's not as used or well-supported elsewhere.

text: but running `php -a` will give you a PHP interpreter on your command line.

elements.text: but running
php -a

text: Making a command line interpreter for harbour is trivial. But it is easier to debug for us working with Harbour than with PHP

text: Es posible que esté trivializando un poco el preprocesador, pero lo único de especial que parece tener en mi experiencia limitada con harbour es la capacidad de convertir código en cadenas.

text: Para mí la principal  diferencia entre harbour o xbase en general y otros lenguajes, es que con xbase pones los dedos encima del teclado y escriben solos, puedo programar en otros lenguajes y hay bastantes que me gustan pero me toca pensar más no se mueven los dedos solos, y eso todavía no lo han inventado en los otros lenguajes

text: Esa capacidad de convertir código en cadenas, en combinación con las formas de hacer eval (codeblocks), te da capacidades de metaprogramación en línea.

elements.text: Esa capacidad de convertir código en cadenas, en combinación con las formas de hacer eval (codeblocks), te da capacidades de metaprogramación en línea.

text: Pero otros lenguajes también pueden hacer metaprogramación, y quizá de forma más natural.

elements.text: Pero otros lenguajes también pueden hacer metaprogramación, y quizá de forma más natural.

text:
I think this is no place to compare programming languages in the way which is better.
You can tell that something is better solved in the xy language and then look for a way to do it in mod harbor. But that mod harbor is the best for us must be clear.

elements.text:
I think this is no place to compare programming languages in the way which is better.
You can tell that something is better solved in the xy language and then look for a way to do it in mod harbor. But that mod harbor is the best for us must be clear.

We certainly need mod harbor as much as our daily bread.
